properties.verseOrder: c1 c2 v1 c1 c2 v2 c1 c2 v3 c1 c2 v4 c1 c2 v5 c1 c2

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Receive oh Lord,
this our offertory,
receive oh Lord,
the little we offer.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Pokea ewe Baba
zawadi zetu zote,
pokea ewe Baba,
ingawa ni kidogo.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Bread and wine,
we offer to you,
receive oh Lord,
the little we offer.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Our offerings,
we offer to you,
receive oh Lord,
the little we offer.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Our happiness,
we offer to you,
receive oh Lord,
the little we offer.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Our kindness,
we offer to you,
receive oh Lord,
the little we offer.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Our parents,
we offer to you,
receive oh Lord,
the little we offer.
